location.content:

1. Thursday: A day of the week.
2. Last Week: A relative time period, indicating one week prior to the current week.
3. Holiday: An event or occasion, which can have various locations depending on the specific holiday being referred to.
4. Last Year: A relative time period, indicating one year prior to the current year.

Therefore, the "Location" entities in the paragraph are not explicitly mentioned.
